experience.description: Responsible for day to day HR functions for leading manufacturer of cryogenic reciprocating and centrifugal pumps and turbo-expanders with approximately 200 employees. Preparation of weekly payroll, successful recruiting efforts, new hire orientation, employee relations issues, wage surveys, and safety program implementation.

Responsible for all day to day HR functions for medical device manufacturer with approximately 50 employees. Administered medical, dental, vision, and other benefit plans, managed personnel transactions, processed payroll, ensured compliance with labor laws, and developed recruiting strategies.

Responsible for a wide variety of HR functions for a unionized power supply manufacturing company with an employee population ranging from 150 to over 700. Managed salary proposals, employee benefit programs, affirmative action plans, and compliance with corporate policies.
